snippet.title: NINJA BRIGADE feat. JONAH WEINGARTEN ★ NOW ON KICKSTARTER - Update Gameplay Trailer ★
snippet.description:
NINJA BRIGADE feat. JONAH WEINGARTEN ★ NOW ON KICKSTARTER - Update Gameplay Trailer ★

WISHLIST NOW KICKSTARTER: 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/impawsiblegames/ninja-brigade-feat-jonah-weingarten

WISHLIST NOW STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1597960/Jonah_Weingartens_Ninja_Brigade/

After an unexpected event in an arcade, Jonah is suddenly sucked into the arcade station game “NINJA BRIGADE“. He takes on the role of the hero who is armed with a katana and a crossbow. Trapped in feudal Japan, he must fight his way through the Yokai hordes to save the world of “Ninja Brigade“ and return to his own. During this the hero learns new skills and earns new ammunition for his crossbow, which help him conquer the ever increasing difficulty and complexity of the levels.

This new metroidvania is currently in development – expect exciting news in the future!

TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/padautzentertainment
DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/9jE8HUAHqB
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/ImpawsibleG
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/impawsiblegames/
HOMEPAGE: https://www.impawsiblegames.de

funded by Gamecity Hamburg
